CC2.flavor:
"It's a bit much, I know, but it reminds my visitors who really holds the power here."
—Davriel Cane
CC2.name: Command Tower
CC2.text: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.

CC2.flavor:
"Come now, dear brother. If you wanted rules, you should have called it a _game_, not a _war_."
—Gisa, to Geralf
CC2.name: Ghoulcaller Gisa
CC2.text: {B}, {T}, Sacrifice another creature: Create X 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens, where X is the sacrificed creature's power.

CC2.name: Liliana, Heretical Healer
CC2.text:
Lifelink
Whenever another nontoken creature you control dies, exile Liliana, Heretical Healer, then return her to the battlefield transformed under her owner's control. If you do, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

CC2.name: Liliana, Defiant Necromancer
CC2.text:
+2: Each player discards a card.
−X: Return target nonlegendary creature card with mana value X from your graveyard to the battlefield.
−8: You get an emblem with "Whenever a creature dies, return it to the battlefield under your control at the beginning of the next end step."

CC2.flavor: Her writhing, boneless movements are unsettling to humans, but hypnotic to her serpent brood.

CC2.text: At the beginning of each upkeep, if you control no Snakes, create a 1/1 black Snake creature token with deathtouch.

CC2.flavor: A whisper of authority rises over a cacophony of grinding machines.
CC2.name: Phyrexian Arena
CC2.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

CC2.flavor:
"Death is a small price to pay for immortality."
—Baron Sengir

CC2.name: Snake // Zombie

CC2.flavor: Deep within the forsaken cavern, a new shadow emerged to devour the light.

CC2.flavor:
"I am greater than rain and nourishment. I am glistening oil and perfection."
—Yawgmoth

As an additional cost to cast this spell, pay X life.
All creatures get -X/-X until end of turn.

DBL.flavor: With Thraben's army recalled to its city walls, outlying villages were left to fend for themselves.

DBL.flavor: A heavy net doesn't always mean a good catch.

DBL.text: Target creature's owner puts it on the top or bottom of their library. You create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token with decayed. (It can't block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.)

+1: Look at the top card of your library. You may reveal that card and put it into your hand. If you do, you lose life equal to its mana value.
−2: Create a 2/3 black Vampire creature token with flying and lifelink.
−7: Sorin the Mirthless deals 13 damage to any target. You gain 13 life.
